dataList.name: Zebra shades
dataList.explain:
试试Zebra shades are an innovative and attractive window covering option.
They feature alternating sheer and solid fabric stripes, creating avisually appealing and unique look.

dataList.name: Roller shades
dataList.explain:
Roller shades are a classic and straightforward window treatmentchoice.
They consist of a single piece of fabric that rolls up and down smoothly.

dataList.name: Cellular shades
dataList.explain: Cellular shades, also known as honeycomb shades, are a smart choicefor window treatments.

dataList.name: Aluminum blinds
dataList.explain:
Aluminum blinds are a popular choice for window coverings
Made from lightweight yet durable aluminum, they are built to last.

dataList.name: Roman shades
dataList.explain:
Roman shades are a charming and sophisticated window coveringoption.
They feature fabric that folds up in soft, graceful pleats when raised.
creating an elegant look.

dataList.name: Vertical blinds
dataList.explain:
Vertical blinds are a practical and flexible choice for window coverings
Composed of long, vertical slats that can be rotated and moved along atrack, they offer easy control over light and privacy.
